ComicInfo.Summary: Terry learns that he will die in two months from a malignant brain tumor. Spawn is torn apart by the belief that Terry's a traitor, but he uses all his power to heal him. This sends Spawn hurtling to Hell's second level, where he is immediately attacked by creatures trying to drain his life-sustaining necroplasm. Then suddenly, memories of past injustices provoke Al into a rage and he rises to fight again.
ComicInfo.Title: Choices
